author: Darrell Etherington
title: Henry Ford Health System to conduct first large U.S. study of hydroxychloroquine’s ability to prevent COVID-19
description: Despite false assertions by the President to the contrary, any potential treatments to counter or prevent COVID-19 are still only at the stage of early investigations, which include one-off treatment with special individual case authorizations, and small-scal…
